channel.title: CVE Feed for Hometory -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hometory -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-22306|2024-08-01T22:43:34.270Z -- hometory -- mang%20board%20wp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Hometory Mang Board WP allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Mang Board WP: from n/a through 1.7.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-30431|2024-06-04T17:38:51.703Z -- hometory -- mang%20board%20wp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Hometory Mang Board WP allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Mang Board WP: from n/a through 1.8.0.
